name: Fresh Maker
description:
Short Information

In Fresh Maker you are able to mix different ingredients to make a fresh out of it.

There are seven ingredients from which you can pick three in one time:

  • Banana
  • Red Apple
  • Cherry
  • Cucumber
  • Cabbage
  • Green Apple
  • Orange

Each of them has it's unique color, which are responsible for final mix' color.

Main Task

is serving the client's preferences. 

By pressing on the customer you can see a color that you need to gain to complete the order and get next customer.

You can mix either three and less than three ingredients in one fresh. All you need is to press on needed ingredients and press the button on blender.

After that try to serve your fresh to a customer and get your accuracy to what you were supposed to mix.
